tool_description: Simulates screen reader interpretation of alternative text and provides readability assessment with pronunciation and flow analysis.

alt_text.description: Alternative text to test with screen reader simulation

screen_reader_type.description: Screen reader to simulate: NVDA, JAWS, VoiceOver, TalkBack

reading_speed.description: Simulated reading speed: slow, normal, fast

language.description: Language code for pronunciation analysis (e.g., en-US, es-ES)

error_messages: Invalid alt text: Provide valid alternative text to test.
Invalid screen reader type: Use one of [NVDA, JAWS, VoiceOver, TalkBack].
Invalid reading speed: Use one of [slow, normal, fast].
Invalid language code: Provide a valid language code (e.g., en-US, fr-FR).
Screen reader simulation failed: Unable to complete readability analysis.
usage: Provide alt_text and optionally screen_reader_type, reading_speed, and language. The tool simulates screen reader experience and provides readability feedback.

pronunciation_issues.description: Words or phrases that may be mispronounced

flow_assessment.description: Assessment of text flow and natural reading rhythm

estimated_reading_time.description: Estimated time to read the alt text in seconds

improvement_suggestions.description: Suggestions for improving screen reader experience
